title: Atlassian vs Intuit vs Goldman Sachs
content:
Education: B.Tech from Tier1 college in CSE
Current Compensation - 30 LPA
Current Org - Product Based Company
Title - Software Engineer
Experience - 3 YOE


OFFER 1 :
Company: Intuit
Title/Level: SDE2
Location: Bangalore, India
Fixed Base: ~ 32 LPA(including PF)
Variable Incentive Pay : 4 LPA
Stock bonus: $45000 stock grant vested over 4 years
Total Compensation (Salary + Variables + Stock) for first year: ~ 45 LPA,
Other Intuit perks and benefits


OFFER2
Organisation - Goldman Sachs
Title/Level: Associate
Location: Bangalore, India
Fixed Base - 35 LPA(Including PF)
Signing Bonus - 5.5 LPA
Performance Bonus - 7-8 LPA (prorated for this year)
Total Compensation (Salary + Signing Bonus + Bonus): ~ 42 LPA,
No other benefits


OFFER3
Organisation - Atlassian
Title/Level: Level 2
Location: WFH
Fixed Base - 38 LPA + 1.71 LPA (PF)
Variable Incentive Pay : 5.7 LPA
Stock bonus: $45200 stock grant vested over 4 years
Total Compensation (Salary + Variables + Stock) for first year: ~ 55 LPA,


Needed suggestion from your end which one would be better in terms of work culture,learning wise and WLB ?
I have to join in few days please suggest as I am really confused.
